name: Mach9
headline: The Fastest Tool for Automating Geospatial Production
description: Mach9 is at the forefront of leveraging advanced machine learning and computer vision techniques to transform geospatial data into actionable insights for urban development and infrastructure management. Our cutting-edge technology automates the detection and analysis of key urban features, aiding in the planning and maintenance of transportation networks.

founders.name: Alexander Baikovitz, Founder
founders.description: I'm excited about building technology that understands how the world changes and can see the unseen.

founders.name: Haowen Shi, Founder
founders.description: Building software to efficiently create actionable 3D maps for critical infrastructure.

raw_markdown="[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/63f8fccfa7f01737f002b02e_Mach9_logo_black.svg)](https://www.mach9.ai/</>)

# The Platform for Automated Geospatial Production
Mach9’s geospatial production software converts massive-scale mobile LiDAR scans into 2D and 3D engineering models up to 30x faster and at half the cost than manual point and click solutions.
[Get Started↗](https://www.mach9.ai/</contact>)
![A picture of digital surveyor in action](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/6725369333aab03a1becf5c0_Screenshot%202024-10-31%20210739.png)
Trusted by leading surveying, engineering, and construction firms around the world
![Eagle Engineering](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/67288393b3a3615fe8ceffbd_eagle_engineering_highres.png)![Fibersmith](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/672c15d97cbc341a929803ea_fibersmith-website-2.png)![Hanson Engineering](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/67288570cb98b3135b287a6a_HansonLogo-OG.jpg)![Michael Baker International](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/672884b22f64aa075bafb26c_MichaelBakerIntl-logo.jpg)![US Department of Energy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/6728851627dac3ad2c555e31_DOE_Color_Seal_Green_Logo_Clear_2860%E2%94%9C%C3%B9719.png)![Power Engineers](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/672880805fe4c8fffd911b9e_power_engineers.png)
![Eagle Engineering](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/67288393b3a3615fe8ceffbd_eagle_engineering_highres.png)![Fibersmith](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/672c15d97cbc341a929803ea_fibersmith-website-2.png)![Hanson Engineering](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/67288570cb98b3135b287a6a_HansonLogo-OG.jpg)![Michael Baker International](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/672884b22f64aa075bafb26c_MichaelBakerIntl-logo.jpg)![US Department of Energy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/6728851627dac3ad2c555e31_DOE_Color_Seal_Green_Logo_Clear_2860%E2%94%9C%C3%B9719.png)![Power Engineers](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/672880805fe4c8fffd911b9e_power_engineers.png)
![Digital Surveyor feature extraction gif](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/6731d72b5b9c34e55d3d27da_digital_surveyor.gif)
### Unlock the benefits of LiDAR and image capture technology
Converting large-scale image and point cloud datasets into actionable maps is labor intensive and time consuming. Mach9 quickly transforms the most complex geospatial datasets into 2D and 3D engineering deliverables. Our industry-leading artificial intelligence technology allows engineering and construction organizations to step away from data processing and focus on the bigger picture ahead.
Mach9 automates:
![Checkmark with a blue circle icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/63f8fccfa7f0174fe502b030_Check_icon.svg)
Feature extraction from camera image and LIDAR datasets
![Checkmark with a blue circle icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/63f8fccfa7f0174fe502b030_Check_icon.svg)
Analysis of key measurements, such as distance and clearance
![Checkmark with a blue circle icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/63f8fccfa7f0174fe502b030_Check_icon.svg)
Production of 2D and 3D engineering deliverables, such as CAD and GIS
#### How to get started with Mach9
![Page with a fold icon in black](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/63f8fccfa7f017194a02b031_Page-Icon.svg)
#### Step 1
Click [here](https://www.mach9.ai/</contact>) to submit a project request form.
![Two dialog message icons overlapping in black](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/63f8fccfa7f01712c502b032_Onboarding-Icon.svg)
#### Step 2
We’ll schedule an onboarding session with one of our technical experts to delve into your data.
![Map outline with pin icon in black](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f8fccfa7f0172c5402b00d/63f8fccfa7f017624502b033_Map-Icon.svg)
#### Step 3
Review your Mach9 map after processing. From there, we can iterate as necessary.
“Mach9 gives us more extensive mobile mapping data faster than ever before because we no longer have to worry about time intensive feature extraction.”
###### Mark Wolcott, P.E.
President, iSee(Formerly Deputy Director for Material Engineering, MDOT SHA)
“Finally, an expeditionary LiDAR solution for decision makers at the edge. Mach9 is the answer for rapid LiDAR collection, dissemination and exploitation.”
###### Jarrett Heavenston
CEO, Tough Stump Technologies(Formerly Combat Controller, USAF)
“People need to know how to use the systems and how to make the most of the data they provide. Mach9’s platform seems uniquely suited to help employees with any learning curve.”
###### Jonathan Barnes
in Geo Week News

generated_description:
### Mach9: Revolutionizing Geospatial Production

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Mach9 is a San Francisco-based startup that’s redefining how we handle geospatial data. Its mission? To be the *fastest tool for automating geospatial production.* With a team of 15, the company’s focus is on leveraging advanced machine learning and computer vision to transform complex geospatial datasets into useful insights—especially in the realm of urban development and infrastructure management.

#### What They Do

Mach9’s flagship software takes massive-scale mobile LiDAR (Light Detection and Ranging) scans and converts them into 2D and 3D engineering models. The result? Up to *30 times faster* processing at *half the cost* of traditional methods. This software automates tedious tasks like feature extraction from image and LIDAR datasets and key measurements (e.g., distances and clearances), enabling engineering and construction professionals to focus on the broader aspects of their projects instead of getting bogged down in data.

#### Why It Matters

In today’s fast-paced world, the ability to instantly transform large datasets into actionable insights isn't just nice to have—it’s essential. Mach9 is shaking up the surveying, engineering, and construction industries by drastically reducing the time and labor needed for mapping and model generation. The company is already trusted by major organizations like the U.S. Department of Energy, Michael Baker International, and various engineering firms around the globe.

#### Getting Started with Mach9

Interested in what Mach9 offers? Getting started is simple:
1. Fill out a project request form.
2. Schedule an onboarding session with a technical expert.
3. Review your processed Mach9 map and iterate as needed through user-friendly prompts.

#### The Bigger Picture

Mach9 isn't just about speed; it’s about enabling organizations to leverage their data effectively and efficiently. As cities grow and infrastructure demand increases, firms need advanced tools to process geospatial data without losing sight of their goals. The promise of Mach9 is to take that burden off their plates, letting them concentrate on executing their vision.

#### Leadership and Community

With Aaron Epstein as a group partner and a strong backing from investors (including a recent $12 million round led by Quiet Capital), Mach9 is poised for growth. Their innovations and contributions to the infrastructure sector are gaining traction, making headlines in tech news outlets for their transformative approaches.

For more information, check their website at [Mach9.ai](https://www.mach9.ai/) and see how they can speed up your geospatial production efforts.
